sqlMap.select:
SELECT ORDER_ID ,TERMINAL_ID ,SUB_MER_ID ,MER_SYS_ID ,AGENT_ID_L2 ,AGENT_ID_L1 ,TRANS_MER_ID ,TRANS_TYPE ,TERMINAL_TYPE ,MER_ORDER_ID ,MER_ORDER_TIME ,MER_AMT ,CURRENCY ,ORDER_STATUS ,REFUND_STATUS ,ORG_ORDER_ID ,CARD_NO ,CARD_TYPE ,ISSUE_BANK_ID ,ISSUE_BANK_NAME ,USER_MOBILE ,BACK_URL ,TRANS_TIME ,FINISH_TIME ,USER_IP ,BATCH_NO ,REFFER_NO ,AUTH_NO ,VOUCHER_NO ,SETTLE_DATE ,RESP_CODE ,RESP_DESC ,REMARK ,RESERVED ,ACCOUNT_NAME ,ACCOUNT2_NO ,ACCOUNT2_NAME ,ACCOUNT2_BANK ,CREATE_DATE ,FULL_CARD_NO ,ORDER_RATE_TYPE ,RESERVED1 ,RESERVED2 ,RESERVED3 ,SETTLE_STATUS ,TRANS_MER_NAME FROM ORDER_INFO1 WHERE 1=1 AND ORDER_INFO1.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ORDER_ID) =#order_id#
(TERMINAL_ID) Like '%'||(#terminal_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_MER_ID) =#sub_mer_id#
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(AGENT_ID_L2) =#agent_id_l2#
(AGENT_ID_L1) =#agent_id_l1#
(TRANS_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#trans_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TERMINAL_TYPE) Like '%'||(#terminal_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_ORDER_ID) Like '%'||(#mer_order_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_ORDER_TIME) Like '%'||(#mer_order_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_AMT) =#mer_amt#
(CURRENCY) Like '%'||(#currency:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORDER_STATUS) Like '%'||(#order_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REFUND_STATUS) Like '%'||(#refund_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORG_ORDER_ID) =#org_order_id#
(CARD_NO) Like '%'||(#card_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_TYPE) Like '%'||(#card_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ISSUE_BANK_ID) Like '%'||(#issue_bank_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ISSUE_BANK_NAME) Like '%'||(#issue_bank_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(USER_MOBILE) Like '%'||(#user_mobile:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BACK_URL) Like '%'||(#back_url:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TIME) Like '%'||(#trans_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FINISH_TIME) Like '%'||(#finish_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(USER_IP) Like '%'||(#user_ip:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BATCH_NO) Like '%'||(#batch_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REFFER_NO) Like '%'||(#reffer_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AUTH_NO) Like '%'||(#auth_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(VOUCHER_NO) Like '%'||(#voucher_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_DATE) Like '%'||(#settle_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESP_CODE) Like '%'||(#resp_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESP_DESC) Like '%'||(#resp_desc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REMARK) Like '%'||(#remark:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT_NAME) Like '%'||(#account_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT2_NO) Like '%'||(#account2_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT2_NAME) Like '%'||(#account2_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT2_BANK) Like '%'||(#account2_bank:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_DATE) Like '%'||(#create_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FULL_CARD_NO) Like '%'||(#full_card_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORDER_RATE_TYPE) Like '%'||(#order_rate_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED1) Like '%'||(#reserved1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED2) Like '%'||(#reserved2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED3) Like '%'||(#reserved3:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_MER_NAME) Like '%'||(#trans_mer_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM ORDER_INFO1 WHERE 1=1 AND ORDER_INFO1.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ORDER_ID) =#order_id#
(TERMINAL_ID) Like '%'||(#terminal_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
